item.title: NASA’s Hubble Finds Strong Evidence for Intermediate-Mass Black Hole in Omega Centauri - Science@NASA
item.description:
1. NASA’s Hubble Finds Strong Evidence for Intermediate-Mass Black Hole in Omega Centauri  Science@NASA
  2. Astronomers spot a mysterious black hole nestled in a cluster of stars  NPR
  3. Hubble finds strong evidence for intermediate-mass black hole in Omega Centauri  ESA/Hubble
  4. Speedy stars blow the cover of hidden black hole  Nature.com
  5. Hubble Space Telescope finds closest massive black hole to Earth — a cosmic clue frozen in time  Space.com

item.title: Get a laptop for less: This elite refurbished HP machine is 21% off
item.description: This near-mint HP EliteBook refurbished laptop has a 14-hour battery life, zippy Intel processor, and 16GB RAM.

item.title: Get this wireless Bluetooth transmitter before your next flight for just $29.99
item.description: With the Mymanu Link Wireless Bluetooth Transmitter and Receiver you can improve the way you use wireless audio, all for $29.99 through July 21.

item.title: Get a MagSafe power bank for 37% off and charge up to six devices at once
item.description: Charge six devices simultaneously with the Flash Pro Plus graphene power bank with MagSafe compatibility, price-dropped to $199.97 (reg. $319) through July 21.

item.title: Webb telescope may have just revealed an alien world with air
item.description: Scientists pointed the James Webb Space Telescope at an exoplanet that could be a habitable world with air and liquid water.

item.title: What is the newest Xbox?
item.description: Xbox doesn't do the easy thing like PlayStation and just use numbers, so we have to work to figure out which Xbox is the newest.

item.title: The 8 best noise-cancelling headphones for flying in 2024
